original_text: And the priest shall wave them with the bread of the firstfruits for a wave offering before the Lord, with the two lambs: they shall be holy to the Lord for the priest.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 첫 이삭의 떡과 함께 그 두 마리 어린 양을 여호와 앞에 흔들어서 요제를 삼을 것이요 이것들은 여호와께 드리는 성물이니 제사장에게 돌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall wave them
with the bread of the firstfruits
for a wave offering before the Lord
they shall be holy to the Lord
